500000002.name: fishing_shop_00
500000002.chinesesimplified: 你来啦，今天有很多好东西呢
500000002.english: You're here! There are lots of good things today.

500000003.name: fishing_shop_01
500000003.english: Welcome! Please feel free to browse and buy.

500000004.name: fishing_shop_02
500000004.chinesesimplified: 今早的鱼篓都快装不下啦~
500000004.english: The fish basket was almost overflowing this morning.

500000005.name: fishing_shop_03
500000005.chinesesimplified: 你今天选购的东西真不少呢！
500000005.english: You’ve picked quite a lot today!

500000006.name: fishing_shop_04
500000006.chinesesimplified: 谢谢惠顾~下次给你更多的折扣
500000006.english: Thank you for your patronage~ Next time, I’ll give you an even bigger discount.

500000007.name: fishing_shop_05
500000007.chinesesimplified: 慢走啊～下次来给您看看我私藏的好货！
500000007.english: Take care~ Next time you come, I’ll show you some of my private

500000009.name: fishing_shop_07
500000009.chinesesimplified: 嘘...我在听海浪预报呢，待会儿告诉您最佳垂钓时间。
500000009.english: Shh... I’m listening to the sea forecast. I’ll tell you the best fishing time later.

500000010.name: fishing_shop_08
500000010.chinesesimplified: 海风捎来远方的消息，说今天会有贵客临门~
500000010.english: The sea breeze brings news from afar, saying that an honored guest will visit today.

500000011.name: fishing_shop_09
500000011.chinesesimplified: 听说周末的时候买食物会更便宜呢
500000011.english: I heard that food is cheaper on weekends.

500000012.name: fishing_shop_10
500000012.chinesesimplified: 想试试手气吗？我这儿连鱼竿都给您准备好啦~
500000012.english: Want to try your luck? I even have a fishing rod ready for you here.

500000013.name: fishing_shop_11
500000013.chinesesimplified: 昨天有条大鱼差点把我的钓竿拽跑啦~
500000013.english: Yesterday, a big fish almost pulled my fishing rod away!

500000014.name: fishing_shop_12
500000014.chinesesimplified: 嘿！快来瞧瞧有没有你中意的～
500000014.english: Hey!  Come take a look and see if there’s anything you like.

500000015.name: fishing_shop_13
500000015.chinesesimplified: 早起的鱼儿进筐早，早来的客人优惠少不了！
500000015.english: Early birds catch the worms, early customers get the best deals!

500000016.name: fishing_shop_14
500000016.chinesesimplified: 今儿个浪花特别给面子，送来一船银光闪闪的宝贝！
500000016.english: The waves were especially kind today, bringing a boatload of shiny treasures!

500000017.name: fishing_shop_15
500000017.chinesesimplified: 眼光真好！这绝对是今天最好的东西了~
500000017.english: You have great taste! This is definitely the best item today.

500000018.name: fishing_shop_16
500000018.chinesesimplified: 哎呀您真识货！看来今天是遇到行家了！
500000018.english: Wow, you really know your stuff! Seems like I’ve met an expert today.

500000019.name: fishing_shop_17
500000019.chinesesimplified: 下次有好东西我肯定跟你说！
500000019.english: Next time I have something good, I’ll definitely let you know.

500000020.name: fishing_shop_18
500000020.chinesesimplified: 听说周末的时候买食物会更便宜呢
500000020.english: I heard that food is cheaper on weekends.

500000021.name: fishing_shop_19
500000021.chinesesimplified: 要不要我给您推荐几款好鱼饵？
500000021.english: Would you like me to recommend some good bait?

500000022.name: fishing_shop_20
500000022.chinesesimplified: 我刚想找个人分享今天的垂钓小技巧呢！
500000022.english: I was just thinking of sharing today’s fishing tips with someone.

500000023.name: fishing_shop_21
500000023.chinesesimplified: 今天的云像鱼群一样好看！
500000023.english: The clouds today look like schools of fish!

500000024.name: fishing_shop_22
500000024.chinesesimplified: 潮水正在赶来的路上，要给您带什么惊喜呢？
500000024.english: The tide is on its way. What surprises will it bring you?

500000025.name: fishing_shop_23
500000025.chinesesimplified: 海星在张望，好奇今天第一位客人会是谁？
500000025.english: The starfish are gazing, curious about who the first customer of the day will be.

500000027.name: fishing_commission_01
500000027.chinesesimplified: 今天想要委托你钓很多的鱼~
500000027.english: Today, I’d like to ask you to catch a lot of fish for me~

500000028.name: fishing_commission_02
500000028.chinesesimplified: 今天天气很好，我们多多钓鱼吧！
500000028.english: The weather is great today—let's fish a lot!

500000029.name: fishing_commission_03
500000029.chinesesimplified: 记得每天都来完成委托哦~
500000029.english: Remember to come back every day to complete the commissions!

500000030.name: fishing_commission_04
500000030.chinesesimplified: 昨晚梦到你钓上一条大鱼，快让我看看是不是真的！
500000030.english: Last night, I dreamed you caught a big fish—hurry, show me if it's true!

500000031.name: fishing_commission_05
500000031.chinesesimplified: 嘿，我的新鱼漂像小星星一样闪，要不要一起试试？
500000031.english: Hey, my new float shines like a little star—want to give it a try together?

500000032.name: fishing_commission_06
500000032.chinesesimplified: 阳光照在鳞片上亮晶晶的！
500000032.english: The sunlight glistens on the scales!

500000033.name: fishing_commission_07
500000033.chinesesimplified: 还有好多委托没完成，好苦恼呀，谁来帮帮我！
500000033.english: There are still so many commissions left unfinished—so frustrating. Who can help me?

500000034.name: fishing_commission_08
500000034.chinesesimplified: 今天湖面静得连涟漪都打瞌睡~
500000034.english: The lake is so calm today that even the ripples seem to be dozing off~

500000035.name: fishing_commission_09
500000035.chinesesimplified: 鱼篓空得能回声，再没人来帮忙，我的晚餐只能吃空气啦。
500000035.english: My fish basket is so empty it echoes—if no one helps, I'll have to eat air for dinner!

500000036.name: fishing_commission_10
500000036.english: Thank you~ You're such a big help!

500000038.name: fishing_commission_12
500000038.chinesesimplified: 哇，连这么难钓的鱼你都钓到了！你太厉害了！
500000038.english: Wow, you even caught such a hard-to-catch fish! You're amazing!

500000039.name: fishing_commission_13
500000039.chinesesimplified: 阳光照在鳞片上亮晶晶的！
500000039.english: The sunlight glistens on the scales!

500000040.name: fishing_commission_14
500000040.english: The reflections in the river bend sway and shimmer~

500000041.name: fishing_commission_15
500000041.chinesesimplified: 背包里带了橘子汽水，钓到大鱼就请你喝！
500000041.english: I brought orange soda in my backpack. If I catch a big fish, I'll treat you to it!

500000042.name: fishing_commission_16
500000042.chinesesimplified: 今天的湖面波光粼粼，肯定能钓到大鱼！
500000042.english: The lake surface is sparkling today—we're sure to catch big fish!

500000043.name: fishing_commission_17
500000043.chinesesimplified: 昨晚梦到一条金光闪闪的大鱼，今天一定要把它钓上来！
500000043.english: Last night, I dreamed of a big, glittering golden fish—today, we must catch it!

500000044.name: fishing_commission_18
500000044.chinesesimplified: 清晨去码头，老渔夫悄悄告诉我“鱼群来了”
500000044.english: This morning at the dock, an old fisherman secretly told me, "The fish are here!"

500000045.name: fishing_commission_19
500000045.chinesesimplified: 今天的太阳像没睡醒，我的鱼饵也跟着打盹，一条都不肯上钩。
500000045.english: The sun seems half-asleep today, and my bait is dozing off too—not a single bite.

500000046.name: fishing_commission_20
500000046.chinesesimplified: 风也偷懒，连波纹都不肯画，你的浮漂快睡着啦。
500000046.english: The wind is slacking off too—not even drawing ripples. Your float is about to fall asleep!

500000047.name: fishing_commission_21
500000047.chinesesimplified: 码头的木板吱呀作响，好像在嘲笑空空如也的网兜哦！
500000047.english: The dock's wooden planks creak as if mocking my empty net!

500000048.name: fishing_commission_22
500000048.chinesesimplified: 你钓的这条鱼，鳞片像水晶一样，闪得我眼睛都花了～
500000048.english: The scales of the fish you caught are like crystal—so dazzling they're blinding me~

500000049.name: fishing_commission_23
500000049.chinesesimplified: 你的抛竿姿势太帅，连旁边的海鸥都看呆了！
500000049.english: Your casting posture is so cool—even the seagulls nearby are stunned!

500000050.name: fishing_commission_24
500000050.chinesesimplified: 收竿时夕阳落在你的鱼堆上，像给它们镀了一层金光！
500000050.english: As you reel in your line, the sunset falls on your pile of fish, as if plating them in gold!
